shiny_inputs.label: Samplesheet
shiny_inputs.help:
Tab-separated entries with the following headers:
ID (required)
R1 (optional) - Paths to (forward) reads zipped FastQ files
R2 (optional) - Paths to reverse reads zipped FastQ files
LongFastQ (optional) - Paths to long reads zipped FastQ files
Fast5 (optional) - Paths to the directory containing FAST5 files
GenomeSize (optional) - A number (including decimals) ending with m, representing genome size.

shiny_inputs.label: Output directory
shiny_inputs.help: The output directory where the results will be saved
